Text: How do you decode this? I't's asking for a filename encoding to which none work? Please help me.
@Grayson: Its packed and can be unpacked with "winrar".  After that the unpacked video file is mkv and can be viewed with "vlc".  I hope that answers your question.
Unfortunately I am on a Mac and have tried every unRARer there is but I do indeed use VLC to view MKV files.
I have very rarely encountered this problem before, this being the second time, of the many thousands of compacted files I have downloaded. Any solution would be greatly appreciated.
Filename encoding such a Western ISO or another is what I need to unarchive here.
